name: cfgo
description: A Go code generator that converts JSON configuration files into type-safe Go structs with environment variable support.

cfgo.binaryPath.description: Path to the cfgo binary. Use 'cfgo' to use the binary from PATH, or specify an absolute path.

cfgo.inputFolder.description: Folder name (relative to module root) where JSON config files are located.

cfgo.outputFolder.description: Folder path (relative to module root) where generated Go files will be saved.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
